about_the_game:
Hello, challengers. Welcome to Fists of Invokers.


This is a MOBA+FTG game. Our game now supports up to 6 players/3 teams fighting in the same stage. Fighting in different stages with different mechanisms. Use your items, Occupy the important area, secure the VIP, The experience of each game will be unique.

2-key combinations

Easy to play, players can perform skills by pressing 2 keys and pressing just 1 key to use the ULTs.

Freestyle Combo System

Different from the traditional fighting game, Freestyle Combo System allows players to freely choose characters' skills and create their own combos. You can choose 4 active skills,1 passive skill, and 1 ULT from your characters' skill base. No one could tell you what is the BEST combo anymore.

Different stage with variable gameplay

The ever-changing stages in the game encourage players to create their own unique playstyle to cope with various unexpected situations - the use of brains can conquer strong muscles.

short_description: Fists of Invokers is a Multiplayer Online Strategy Action game. Like a MOBA+FTG. It`s a 2v2v2 brawler. Make a strategy before the battle, customize your skills and items. Fight online with friends and strangers in different stages and become the last one standing.
